name: Beware The Slime
description:
Active fullscreen mode /!\ 

“Beware the Slime!” is a game we made for the 40th Ludum Dare as videogame students.

It’s a versus game : Fight for staying alive ! Armed with your gun, slow your opponent with slime shots : the goal is simple: take him out of the screen !

Only work with two xbox controllers and a friend !!!
